summary: Email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to counsel regarding a proposed protective order for materials responsive to a Rule 17 subpoena in the Epstein case. The email attaches a draft order and requests feedback by noon.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email proposing a protective order for Rule 17(c) materials in the Epstein case.

events.title: Deadline for Proposed Protective Order
events.description: The Court requires a proposed protective order by noon for materials responsive to a Rule 17 subpoena.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.address: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 24, 2021, regarding a proposed protective order for Rule 17(c) materials in the Epstein case.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is corresponding with counsel to submit a draft protective order to the Court by noon.
The proposed order aims to apply existing protective order provisions to materials responsive to a Rule 17 subpoena.
The email indicates ongoing legal proceedings and evidence handling related to the Epstein case as of late 2021.
